----------------------------------------

Blurs images and videos and removes ads when browsing content platforms, enabling focused information access with reduced visual distractions. Gain control over attention amidst internet noise while avoiding awkward situations in public spaces.

When browsing content platforms, numerous unrelated images can easily lead to distraction, disrupting the process of information acquisition and making it difficult to stay focused. Open-content platforms like Twitter may display inappropriate images, making them unsuitable for public viewing. The overuse of images and intrusive videos creates visual noise, gradually weakening the ability to engage with text-only content and diminishing the depth of information conveyed amidst these visual shifts.

âœ¨ Feature
1ã€Remove platform ads.
2ã€Gain more control over your attention.
3ã€Reduce visual distractions caused by noisy content.
4ã€Avoid awkward situations caused by inappropriate images appearing in public.
